title: The Scottish Fiddle Orchestra-The Fiddlers Party
description: This recording is a collection of 17 of the finest Scottish fiddle dance music, carefully put together to make it easy for everyone to select the appropriate music for their favorite dances. Experience The Scottish fiddle orchestra with their charismatic and inspiring performance on DVD and also on CD.

1) The Bluebell Polka. 2) The Military Two Step: Ronald Cooper - The Dwarfie Stane. 3) Canadian Barn Dance: Jock McCallum of Rodel - Harvest Home. 4) Strip The Willow: The Prince of Wales - Kenmure's On and Awa' - Top of Ben Lomond - Bonnie Dundee - Jig of Slurs - Cock of the North. 5) Lomond Waltz: Come O'er the Stream Charlie - O Gin I Were A Baron's Heir - Ye Banks and Braes - Logie O' Buchan - Kirkonnel Lea - Dark Lochnagar. 6) The Dashing White Sergeant: The Original - Rakes of Mallow - Waves of Tory - Stronsay Wedding - Siege of Ennis - Reel of Kildinguie - The Original. 7 The Eva Three Step: Dovecot Park - Mary Sandeman's Farewell to Ness - Dovecote Park. 8) The Gay Gordons: MacFarlane o' the Sproats o' Burnie Boosie - Barnyards o' Dalgety - Mormond Braes - Muckin' o' Geordie's Byre . 9) The Canadian Barn Dance: Duncan McKinnon's Welcome to Port Ellen - John McFadyen of Melfort. 10) Highland Schottische: Maid of Islay - Trumpet Hornpipe. 11) The Brittannia Two Step: Whistling Rufus . 12) St. Bernard's Waltz: John Robertson's Scottish Waltz. 13) The Boston Two Step: Home To Bon Accord. 14) The Gay Gordons: Major Norman Orr Ewing - Hills of Drumorchy - John D.Burgess . 15) Highland Schottische: Orange and Blue - Loudon's Bonnie Woods - The Braes o' Mar - Kafoozalum - Keel Row - Orange and Blue. 16) The Duke Of Perth: The Original - Lady MacKenzie of Coul - Stumpie - My Love She's But A Lassie Yet. 17) The Eightsome Reel: Mrs.MacLeod of Raasay - The Fairy Dance - De'il Among the Tailors - Soldier's Joy - Mason's Apron - Staten Island - Kate Dalrymple
